headline: BlackRock Balances IBIT Volatility With Private Markets And Tech Expansion
summary: BlackRock's spot bitcoin ETF, IBIT, saw record trading volumes and net outflows during a sharp crypto market sell off, as investors reacted to reports of a highly leveraged hedge fund unwind and wider institutional de risking. At the same time, BlackRock moved to accelerate its private market technology stack through high profile partnerships, while regulators increased scrutiny of its expanding role in public and private markets. The firm also broadened its reach through new board...
